column1: Kata Robata////Now on to the food
column2: the fish is very fresh and normally I would do some salmon
column5: sweet shrimp and if I'm feeling spoil I will do some toro or Otoro nigiri. Prices range from $3-$5 a piece
column6: but so worth it because the cut of the fish is very generous unlike some places that charge the same for half the size.
